channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Scoop: Dan Scavino takes over hiring in Trump's White House
item.description: Senior Trump adviser Dan Scavino is taking over as director of the White House Presidential Personnel Office — an influential role charged with staffi...

item.title: Trump ignites Fed war
item.description: President Trump moved to fire Fed governor Lisa Cook last night . Why it matters: It's legally unclear if the president has that power. So Trump touch...

item.title: Where home insurance costs the most — and least
item.description: Data: Bankrate ; Map: Alex Fitzpatrick/Axios Extreme weather is driving sky-high home insurance prices in some especially storm-prone parts of the cou...

item.title: Why job hopping might no longer pay
item.description: Data: BLS, Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta via Bank of America Institute ; Chart: Axios Visuals For years, job hopping was the surest path to a hefty ...

item.title: JD Vance to speak to Wisconsin workers on megabill
item.description: Vice President JD Vance will travel to La Crosse, Wisconsin, on Tuesday to speak at a steel fabricating facility about the megabill's benefits for man...

item.title: Trump moves to fire Federal Reserve governor Lisa Cook
item.description: Trump said he would remove Cook immediately, citing unproven allegations of mortgage fraud. Cook said he had no power to fire her and that she would n...

item.title: The Trump administration’s new weapon against foes: Mortgage filings
item.description: The Trump administration’s weaponization of mortgage filings, experts say, is an escalation in the way his officials seek to penalize, remove or even ...

item.title: These states could redistrict before the 2026 midterms
item.description: As Trump pushes for a more Republican-friendly House map, more than half a dozen states are potential targets for mid-decade tweaks to congressional b...

item.title: Judge orders new map that could give Democrats another House seat — in Utah
item.description: A judge ruled that Republican lawmakers in Utah illegally drew a congressional map that gave their party all of the state’s congressional seats.

item.title: Bolton continues criticism of Trump foreign policy following FBI raids
item.description: In a new op-ed, Bolton argued Trump’s Ukraine policy is “no more coherent today than it was last Friday” when the raids happened.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
